violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer name 'Алексей' collected but operator uses name without requesting confirmation ('Верно?' or 'Правильно?'). Surname 'Калинин' at 3:31.64s also collected without confirmation request. Phone number '912-778-1421' was properly confirmed, showing operator knows the method but inconsistently applied it.

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Search announcement 'Минуту, пожалуйста' at 3:57.17, search completion 'Спасибо за ожидание' at 6:37.19. Total duration: 160 seconds. Threshold violation: >45 seconds. During search, operator speaks off-phone (with child: 'Играем! Ну иди сюда ускотов!') but does not check in with customer during 2-minute+ wait.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not consistently applied for contact data verification
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When collecting customer name or surname, always repeat the data back and request explicit confirmation with 'Верно?', 'Правильно?', or 'Подтверждаете?' Phone collection was done correctly - use the same pattern for all contact data.

coaching_priorities.issue: Extended search duration without customer check-ins
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Keep information searches under 40 seconds. If search takes longer, provide status updates to customer every 30-40 seconds to maintain engagement and show service continuity. Current search took 160 seconds with no mid-search customer updates.

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected from operator. Professional tone throughout call.

2.1.evidence: Operator completed call professionally. Service provided fully - order placed (963918).

3.1.evidence: Customer request to order winter tires with specific address resolved. Order placed and specialist team assigned to update city field.
3.1.note: Customer's immediate need met. Follow-up action deferred to specialist team for city correction.

3.3.evidence: No confidential information disclosed without authorization. Delivery company information (Луч, песен, бокс 3) is customer-facing order information.

3.6.evidence: Information sourced from system/database. Operator announces search before providing: tire sizes (205/55 R16), prices (7370/6633), delivery info.

4.1.evidence: Operator handles frustrated customer (address issue) professionally without showing frustration. Maintains patience and problem-solving approach.
4.1.note: Customer somewhat frustrated but operator response indicates good customer handling.

5.1.evidence: All core information provided: tire details, pricing, delivery options, payment methods, order number (963918), phone contact.

6.1.evidence: Although search duration was 160 seconds (>45s threshold), customer remained on line and did not hang up. No customer hangup detected.
6.1.note: Long silence but customer waited - does not meet criteria (requires customer hangup).

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting: 'Здравствуйте, компания 74 колеса, меня зовут Ирина, как я могу к вам обращаться?' Proper closing: 'Спасибо за заказ. Всего вам доброго. До свидания.' Script sequence followed.

7.2.evidence: Name 'Алексей' and surname 'Калинин' collected without confirmation request. Phone '912-778-1421' properly confirmed - showing inconsistent application of echo method.

7.3.evidence: Intro at 3.94s from call start (<5s). Disconnect at 0.31s after last speech (<5s).

7.4.evidence: No unpologized customer interruptions detected. Operator speech does not overlap customer speech in disruptive manner.

9.1.evidence: Search period 237.17s to 397.19s = 160 seconds. Exceeds 45-second threshold. No mid-search customer check-ins during this duration.

9.3.evidence: Operator thanks customer 'Спасибо за ожидание' at 6:37.19, within 5 seconds of search completion.

10.2.evidence: Information provided per script. Logical flow: greeting → data collection → product search → pricing → payment options → order → closing.

10.3.evidence: Operator uses customer name throughout (Алексей, Калинин). Builds rapport, maintains professional tone, proper opening/closing.

10.6.evidence: Comprehensive information delivered: tire specifications (R16 зимние 205/55), extended warranty, fuel gift (15L), delivery details, payment options, order number.

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company name and operator name
Completed order successfully (Order #963918) despite system address limitations
Handled frustrated customer (address issue) with patience and problem-solving approach
Provided comprehensive information: tire specs, pricing with discount calculation, delivery details
Thanked customer for waiting during extended search
Used customer name consistently throughout call (Алексей, Калинин)
Proper professional closing with offer for additional help
Applied echo method correctly for phone number verification
Explained complex payment options clearly (website payment, discount structure)
Escalated unresolved city issue to specialist team with customer contact info

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps enable precise detection of echo method violations and search timing. Transcription confidence levels average 0.78+ across call.
